name: BookShelf
0:
”Alexa open my bookshelf”
”start a new reading session”
”Alexa what is the definition of "capricious"”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my bookshelf
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Virtual Reading Companion who tracks statistics on your reading.

Lets you look up words while you read and helps you remember the new definition
Tracks your reading time and total pages across the month and years
And finally keeps a virtual copy of your bookshelf with a bookmark for each book.
